name: snow-background
description: Animated snow effect for VS Code

snowBackground.windowsUsername.description: Your Windows username (required for WSL users). Leave empty for auto-detect on native Windows.

snowBackground.areas.description: Areas to show snow effect: editor, sidebar, panel, activitybar, or fullscreen

snowBackground.color.description: Snow color in RGB format (e.g., '255, 255, 255' for white)

scripts.vscode:uninstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),os=require('os'),path=require('path');const paths=[];if(process.platform==='win32'){const l=process.env.LOCALAPPDATA||path.join(os.homedir(),'AppData','Local');paths.push(path.join(l,'Programs','Microsoft VS Code','resources','app','out','vs','workbench','workbench.desktop.main.js'),'C:\\Program Files\\Microsoft VS Code\\resources\\app\\out\\vs\\workbench\\workbench.desktop.main.js');}else if(process.platform==='linux'){try{if(fs.readFileSync('/proc/version','utf8').toLowerCase().includes('microsoft')){const u='/mnt/c/Users';if(fs.existsSync(u)){fs.readdirSync(u).filter(x=>!['Public','Default','Default User','All Users'].includes(x)&&!x.startsWith('.')).forEach(x=>paths.push('/mnt/c/Users/'+x+'/AppData/Local/Programs/Microsoft VS Code/resources/app/out/vs/workbench/workbench.desktop.main.js'));}paths.push('/mnt/c/Program Files/Microsoft VS Code/resources/app/out/vs/workbench/workbench.desktop.main.js');}}catch{}paths.push('/usr/share/code/resources/app/out/vs/workbench/workbench.desktop.main.js');}else if(process.platform==='darwin'){paths.push('/Applications/Visual Studio Code.app/Contents/Resources/app/out/vs/workbench/workbench.desktop.main.js');}paths.forEach(p=>{try{if(fs.existsSync(p)){let c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(c.includes('SNOW-BACKGROUND-START')){c=c.replace(/\/\* SNOW-BACKGROUND-START \*\/[\s\S]*?\/\* SNOW-BACKGROUND-END \*\//g,'');fs.writeFileSync(p,c,'utf8');}}}catch{}});"
